options.value: "Columns (1) - (4) use the Constraint on the Executive as the proxy for mu, columns (5) and (6) use the Investment Profile Score. Standard errors in parentheses and clustered at the country-year level (used for stars) in [ ]. WLS weighting by remaining barrels of oil equivalent. * p < 0.10. ** p < 0.05. *** p < 0.01. Columns (1) and (2) include the full sample, columns (3) to (6) include IOC only."
